name: RetroTime Playdate
description:
A playdate game containing 8 retro based games playable in 3 game modes (port of my SDL2 version)

The games can be played in 3 game modes:
In Retro Carousel mode you will play all games for 2 minutes after each other. You can not die by losing lives. Points will be deducted from the score when dying. The aim is to get the highest score, accumulated over all the games.

In Lives mode you play a single game and start with a fixed amount of lives. Dying will lose you one live. The game is over if the lives reaches 0. The aim of the game is to get the highest score possible without dying.

In Time Attack mode you play a single game for 5 minutes. You can not die by losing lives. Points will be deducted from the score when dying. The aim is to get the highest score during these 5 minutes of playing.

There are 8 retro based games implemented in this game
Invaders is a game based on Space Invaders (Arcade). Rows of enemies are closing in you. You have to shoot them down before they reach your mining asteroids. Shooting down enemies gains points, shooting down all enemies gains extra points. You can move with dpad and shoot with (A). If enemies reach your mining asteroids you will lose a life. Avoid being shot or you will also lose a life.

Brick Breaker is a game based on Breakout (Arcade). Rows of blocks have to be destroyed by touching them with the ball. You control the paddle at the bottom of the screen with the dpad. Keeping (A) pressed speeds up the paddle. You have to let the ball bounce of your paddle to send it back in the playfield. Destroying blocks gains points. Fail to bounce back the ball and you lose a life.

Toady is a game based on Frogger (Arcade). You control the pet by the dpad and you have to keep moving up. Each time you move up to a place you had not reached yet, you will gain points. Avoid getting hit by traffic, don't fall into water, don't exceed the edges of the playfield or you will lose a life. Collect different fruit to gain extra score.

Snakey is a game based on well snake (Nokia 3310). You control a snake's head (red block) by the dpad. The snake can move in four directions and wants food (green blocks). Each time you eat food the snake's body will grow. Eat food to gain points, the longer your snake is to more points you will gain. Touching the snake's body or going outside the playfield will lose you a life.

Bubble Buster is a game based on Pang (Arcade). You control a player that needs to pop bubbles. You can control the player using the dpad and shoot at bubbles using (A) button. If you hit a bubble it will split up into smaller bubbles and you gain points. Get hit by a bubble and you will lose a life, making you temporary invincible but you can not shoot during this time. Clearing all bubbles gives you extra points.

Block Stacker is a game of tetris. You control the blocks with the dpad. You need to stack them in such a manner that they form complete rows. Once this is done that row will be removed. Speed increases gradually and having no place at the top to place a block will lose you a life. You can rotate blocks using (A).

Color Invasion is a game based on Ram-It (Atari 2600). You control the cannon with the dpad. You need to shoot the invading colored bars completely of the screen using (A). Points are awarded when the color bar is completely of the screen, the closer a bar had gotten to the cannon the more points you will gain. You also gain extra points for clearing all bars from the screen. When a colored bar reaches the cannon rail you will lose a life.

Faster Dave is a game based on Fast Eddie (Atari 2600). You control Dave with the dpad. You need to avoid or jump over enemies with the (A) button while collecting the magic balls. When you collect 9 balls the end level key is reachable. You are safe on ladders. Points are received for collecting magic balls and getting the end level key. Collecting the 10th magic ball is not required. When you touch an enemy you will a lose life. Every 5 levels, level layout changes.

description:
The AmberBall is back in a huge new adventure with all that you requested !
22 new levels, time trials, and an insanely hard tower of glory.

name: Projeto: Átomo
description: In Projeto: Átomo, a thrilling shoot'em up/bullet hell game, you command the Alefuzo team's spaceship racing to escape Mars after a disastrous expedition.

name: Chack'n Pop
description: Sin descripción

name: Coalminer
description: Coalminer is a game where speed is the key. Your task is to lead a small digger through the mine using the joystick within a given time, which at the beginning will appear to you quite as a bad joke. You need to collect a certain number of symbols (diamonds) without colliding with one of the numerous underground inhabitants, as this instantly leads to the loss of a life.

name: Friday Night Funkin' Vs. Ourple Guy
description: Ourple Guy is a non-profit Friday Night Funkin' Mod that adapts Five Nights At Freddy's! However the mod is not meant to be taken seriously as its just us having goofy fun with these characters, some of which that are either our own interpretation of FNAF characters, or some new characters, too!

name: Mimic Dungeon
description: Help the Wizard escape the dungeon by killing enemies with the staff that makes everyone copy his moves.

name: Hallow Hunt
description: Hallow Hunt is a roguelike top-down shooter set during Halloween in a strange cemetery full of unredeemed souls. While unknown forces are haunting the land of the undead, you have to pass through spooky monsters and frightening bosses to retrieve the hallow artifact and bring it back to its rightful place... well, at least you can try.

name: Cliff Jump
description:
Sports game

Diving competition

name: Vecdrift
description: Car racing game

name: Wetcat
description: Wetcat is about a curious little cat that got lost deep in the city's sewage system.

name: Fly High
description: Dodge the walls to fly as high as possible!

name: Tee Time
description: Minigolf

name: Kira Kira Rhythm Collection
description: A rhythm game where you customize and play as a cheerleader in various short songs and minigames.

name: Mori no Cafeteria: Oshare na Cafe Recipe
description: Sin descripción

name: Quiz Kirameki Star Road
description: Sin descripción

name: StairCase 55
description: An atmospheric psychological horror game that plunges you into an anomalous, paradoxical stairwell. Equipped only with a flashlight, navigate through the abyss of the procedurally generated staircase, haunted by an ever-adapting presence. Unravel the mystery of SCP-087.

name: Witch's Bananas
description: Witch's Bananas is a physics-based platformer where you collect a witch's lost banana collection by jumping around in during a time limit.

name: Scimitar
description: 20 shortish levels split into three episodes: Rear Entry, Knee Deep in the Sludge and Into the Blood. "The Source" - That's what they call it. No one quite knows what it is, apart from the birthing grounds of the monstrous army that invaded your planet. Your team was sent to destroy it, but the way in was heavily guarded, and now only you survive. You'll have to find another way in...

name: Ezekiel
description: Ezekiel is a nine-map Doom II episode WAD for limit-removing source ports created by various mappers, led by Jon Vail (40oz). The first episode is based around fast-paced combat and 1999-style levels with a similar aesthetic to Hell Revealed 2 and Thy Flesh Consumed. Episode 2 features a swampy dark green and grey Heretic and Hexen styled aesthetic, with large layouts and large monster quantities. The unfinished third episode was meant to feature suspenseful exploratory levels with jump scares and high contrast lighting, in a theme featuring lots of cement, charred rock and vine textures.

name: Somewhere in Time
description: Somewhere in Time is a set of 15+1 pure vanilla Doom 2 maps, inspired by the greatest of this category, most importantly Reverie, Revolution! and Scythe.

name: Nordhell
description: Nordhell is a single-level PWAD for Doom II meant for the GZDoom source port, released in December 2007. Also titled "Death-Moroz" on the automap and intermission screen, it was designed by Alexander S. (Eternal) and uses the music track "". Nordhell was created to celebrate the coming new year of 2008, and was released alongside a different Nordhell for limit removing ports.

name: Nordhell
description: Nordhell is a three-level limit-removing PWAD released in December 2007 by Alexander S. (Eternal). It was created in celebration of the coming new year, and was released alongside a different Nordhell for GZDoom. This WAD was later updated by Eternal in 2008 and 2009 to add two new maps to similarly celebrate the new years of that time. The PWAD furthermore comes with a custom enemy through DeHackEd, the evil marine originally from Scythe 2, but with a brown, rather than red, uniform.

name: A Taste for Blood
description: 6-map episode for Doom 2. These maps, ranging from small to large, hopefully combines good detail and atmosphere with, at times, strong difficulty.

name: Congestion 384
description: 20 levels with play limited to a 384x384 square!

name: Data Center
description: The UAC's primary data center has been invaded by the monsters of hell in order to steal some intelligence and ultimately wipe out the human race. The center's population has been wiped out and you are the only hope of reclaiming the UAC's secrets from the demons. Find the source of the infestation before the monsters are able to use our secrets against us.

name: The Attraction to All Things Uncertain
description: A city now mutated into hell.

name: Fracture
description: Industrial, factories, human enemies...

name: Infected Area
description: Infected Area is a Doom II episode replacement mod of seven levels, created by Chuck Grant in 1996.

name: Prisoner
description: Prisoner is a classic 2d RPG with a science fiction theme in which the player controls a character that is in a town and will have to talk to different characters to advance in his quests.

name: Dystopia 3: Re-Birth of Anarchy
description: Dystopia 3: Re-Birth of Anarchy is an 11 level WAD. It was one of the first WADs to exploit editing tricks discovered for the Doom engine, such as deep water and the famous double 3D bridge. While its gameplay was true to Doom II's style, the project's level of detail was revolutionary for its time, with levels containing custom textures, crashed spaceships, and elaborate architecture in varied environments, subtly referring to a self-contained story.

name: Ol' No Name
description: 4 levels for boom format using Darkening 2 textures

name: Foursite
description: 4-in-1 map concept. The Foursite military base lies abandoned. You’ve heard rumors of a secret backdoor entrance: find the entrance, explore the four quadrants of the base, reach the heart, and escape alive.

name: 900 Deep in the Dead
description: Nine maps with less than 100 lines each, hence '900 Deep in the Dead'.

name: Nex Credo
description: Nex Credo is 11 levels of an aborted megaWAD for vanilla

name: Murderous Intent
description: Now might be a good time to quit the job, make your way to the city and get off of Mars.

name: Sinister Intention
description: 7 maps done by Jayextee after a 10 year mapping break

name: Elegy
description: There are small 11 maps. Episode 1 (Map 1-6) is "Uranus", and episode 2 (Map 7-11) is "Ares".

name: Uplink
description: Three maps taking place in a virtual reality infected by Hell.

name: Dystopia 3: Re-Birth of Anarchy Addon
description: An Add-on Level for Dystopia3. A Single level, that will keep you wanting more!

name: Pebble Jame
description: A merging puzzle game inspired by a certain game with watermelons. Merge pebbles together in multiple different game modes and see how high of a score you can get!

name: Shotgun Mario 64
description: Sin descripción

name: Brain Champ
description: Brain Champ is a brain training game with single and daily exercises, which test four areas of mental computation: Visual, Memory, Calculation, and Logic over a total of 16 exercises and 3 increasing difficulties of Junior, Master, and Genius.

name: Youkai Hana Asobi
description: Youkai Hana Asobi is a hanafuda game with multiple modes to play through.

name: Heaven and Hell
description: This is a tense and thrilling escape game with a modern ugly and cute texture style that makes people cannot move their eyes away.

name: High Stakes Gambling
description:
High Stakes Gambling is a Game Boy casino video game that takes place during the Great Depression in the 1930s.

An FBI agent named Pete Rosetti, who is going undercover as an intrepid gambler, must turn the Mafia from filthy rich to dirt poor in a series of gambling games in order to arrest them.

In each of the game's five missions, the player competes against a different Mafia member of increasing difficulty in four rounds of casino games. The three preliminary rounds are blackjack, slot machines, and video poker; with the final confrontation being five-card draw poker. The player is provided with ten thousand dollars in his bank account at the start of each round. Each preliminary round awards the winner with a bonus of ten thousand dollars and five draw poker points to be used in the final round; the loser receives no money and two points.

The game's practice mode also includes craps, though it never appears in the game's missions.

For a price, players can buy a variety of special cheating tools in the hopes of making a profit off the gangsters, who often use cheating methods of their own.[3][4] When running low on cash, the gangsters increase the frequency of their cheating in an attempt to regain their cash from the player.

name: Monsters and Spirits
description: Are you tired of standing there and harvesting monsters waiting in line to die in boredom? Are you tired of the monotony of skill combinations? In the demon spirit, you can completely free yourself from these boredom

name: Cells
description: Cells is a clicker idle game set in the world of microbiology. Take on the role of a scientist and experiment with digital single-celled organisms as they interact and evolve based on realistic physics and genetics.

name: Anger of Peace 5
description: Anger of Peace 5 is a multiplayer/single player FPS combat game that supports up to 10V10 players in online battles, as well as offline single player games.

name: Wings of Redemption
description: Wings of Redemption is rogue-lite top-down action game with focus on combining melee and ranged combat. Destroy hordes of monsters in randomly generated maps with variety of weapons on your way towards freedom.

name: God of Death
description: Embark on a thrilling journey in God Of Death, an action roguelike where you must ascend Rohz's tower to reclaim the last light of the world. You will need to acquire new weapons and accessories in your inventory and carefully upgrade them to survive the monster attack in each tower level.

name: Abyss of Cain
description: It's a side-scrolling strategy game with deck-building and roguelike elements. Players will play the role of a pit explorer driving a mecha, collect various equipment, defeat underground monsters, and uncover the secrets of the "Abyss of Cain" step by step.

name: Lady of Bones, a Mother's Legacy
description: It always rains, they call it The Haze. Ghosts haunt every alley, every gray corner of the city. Lady of Bones is a visual novel that explores the darkest depths of existence where Maya will discover the horrible secrets of her mother's legacy.

name: Phantom Blaze
description: Phantom Blaze is entirely inspired by the bravery of Indian Commanders and their killing instincts. Hunting for weapon and equipment to kill the opportunity while saving themselves remain the fundamental spur throughout the game.

name: Ghost Hunters
description: "Ghost Hunters" is a Co-Op horror game that can be played with 1-4 players. You need to detect and catch the ghosts that have just taken over the city. You must detect paranormal activities, collect as much evidence as possible and hunt the ghosts.

name: Fantasy Three Kingdoms and Eight Formations
description: You can choose to join different vassal camps. Depending on your personal preferences and strategy, you can become a counselor, participating in decision-making and strategizing; Or become a warrior general, conquer the battlefield, and lead the army to conquer the enemy.

name: CatBox
description: In this 2D puzzle game you will have to arrange your feline friends in more than 300 levels. Gradually changing locations will add new challenges.

name: Within Yourself
description: In Within Yourself, you are to complete a total of three stages. You are given clues throughout the game on what to do next to progress.

name: WizardWars.Online
description: WizardWars.online is a fast paced multiplayer game featuring strategic spell based combat. Players battle both NPCs and enemy players in short-lived matches. Progress your wizard, hone your skills, and team up with friends to win in the most magical battle royale title of 2024!

name: Block Games:Avoid
description: This is a minimalist block type game that tests reaction and perseverance. In order to achieve extreme minimalism, after trying many elements, I chose to use blocks as the main element. Go manipulate the blocks to avoid more blocks! Go challenge your limits!

name: Lost Legacy: The Awakening of the Seals
description: Lost Legacy: The Awakening of the Seals plunges you into a fantastic world full of epic challenges and ancient magic. The kingdom prospered, until envy and evil unleashed a devastating war. Now, the cruel leader's prophecy is about to come a new era of darkness.

name: CritterGarden
description: CritterGarden is an upcoming creature-collector/life sim with a focus on carefully crafting a unique garden to breed and evolve Critters!

name: LastRo
description: LastRo is a top-down shooter roguelike where you play robot, which mission is to clear up a lot of floors against different enemies. Your enemies are "evolving", which means they become stronger with each floor and difficulty you beat. Try out different weapons, abilities and upgrades to beat them.

name: Elara
description: Learn how to code, solve puzzles, explore one of Jupiter's moons, and save your friend!

name: Roam
description: Roam is a 2D Action-RPG platformer with roguelike, metroidvania and survival elements in a procedurally generated open world. You have to explore the surrounding lands and the depths of mysterious caves that have existed for centuries at the bottom of the local lake.

name: Great Flame
description: Great Flame is a 3D adventure game with role-playing game (RPG) elements. Take on the role of a traveler who has magical powers and go on a dangerous adventure to explore the depths of the dungeon! You have to clear locations from monsters and bosses using magical weapons!

name: Kipidon
description: A colorful shooter that uses a flower as a cupid's arrow. Shoot as many people as you can before time runs out!

name: Grappling Gunners: Arena FPS
description: Grappling Gunners is a free multiplayer FPS with two grappling shots for high-speed gunfights and full freedom of movement. Utilize seven skills, including teleportation and bullet time.

name: Siege Island
description: Step into the world of Siege Island, a tribute to the classic arcade game "Rampart" by Atari. Prepare yourself for an immersive 3D action-puzzle game that will test your strategic skills and reflexes. As the Orcish fleet draws near, the duty to safeguard your island from their assaults is yours.

name: Yua's Yuri Office
description: Yua's Yuri Office is a Visual Novel in which you play as Yua, just returning to the office after things have been shut down for an extended period. Yua is determined to take full advantage of this fresh start to improve her life. Will she pursue friendship, romance, or just focus on her work?

name: Grimbound
description: A minimalistic blend of RTS, Tower Defence, and Survivors-like. Build your city and take command of your troops in a battle against ruthless monster hordes. Upgrade your hero and stand shoulder-to-shoulder with your army in this grimdark fantasy world!

name: Party PooperZ
description: Party Pooperz is an awesome chaotic partygame, where you compete against your friends. The fate of tonight's party theme rests on your shoulders, steal guests and use items to make your party the most popular. Let the battle for the most legendary party begin!

name: CyberFarm
description: CyberFarm allows you to experience the authentic life of a Russian village in the year 2124. Dive into both the bright and dark facets of the Russian soul!

name: Hazardous: Ovesis
description: Ovesis: Hazardous is a crafting-survival game where you explore cyberpunk and biopunk worlds.

name: Quill
description: Co-operative 3-player roguelike dungeon crawler. Adventure as brave actors who find themselves trapped in the powerful playwright's magical dungeon, and seek to uncover the mysteries of the Quill.

name: Deep Deep Deep Nightmare
description: Deep Deep Deep Nightmare is a 2D Top Down Shooter. Survive by facing monsters in the nightmare of a little boy who didn’t heed his mother’s warnings that eating too much before bed can cause nightmares.

name: Mint Christmas
description: Get ready for a festive fun match 3 game. Featuring 2 exciting modes including a 12 round collection mode where you must get all the presents out of the grid before time runs out. Collect powerups and maybe you'll get extra time or perhaps a bomb to keep things moving. Can you beat all 12 rounds?

name: Convicted
description: Convicted is a 2D top-down asymmetrical multiplayer horror game inspired by SCP and Space Station 13. Escape a secret Soviet facility full of dangerous anomalies, be part of the lab and try your best at containing them, or even play as the anomalies themselves and hunt down the other survivors!

name: The Holyburn Witches
description: An atmospheric survival-horror game made from chilling panoramic photographs and terrifying sound design. According to old Scottish folklore, witches haunt the forests of the accursed village of Holyburn.

name: Self-indulgence
description: In Self-indulgence, players delve deep into the haunting psyche of the game's lone developer. Engulfed by a relentless cycle of self-destruction. A single-player, old-school survival horror experience that explores the harrowing confines of personal demons.

name: Rogue Racer
description: Race across the continent against the police and rival racers alike, survive bizarre encounters and become the Rogue Racer.

name: Pallet Panic
description: Dive into 'Pallet Panic,' an action-packed forklift frenzy that blends strategic logistics with fast-paced fun. Manage the chaos of a vibrant factory, combining, lifting, and racing to become the ultimate forklift operator. Unleash your skills in this whimsical world of cartoony mayhem!

name: Once Upon a Rogue's Tale
description: Embark on a journey through your favorite fairytales in this charming roguelike deckbuilding board game. Will you help Little Red Riding Hood find her grandmother or help the Frog Prince break his curse? How the story continues is up to you....

name: Scrap Magic
description: Do YOU like magic, guns, and adventure, then this is the game for you. Scrap Magic is a 3D, open world adventure game. Solve puzzles, explore, and restore the city to it's former glory. But beware, the land is dangerous with the monsters and roaming freely with no one to challenge their tyranny.

name: Immortal Beast
description: Immortal Beast - Dynamic 2D roguelike with a wide variety of enemies and weapons. You will play as a treasure hunter who has decided on a desperate adventure in search of wealth and glory! You will go down into a dark dungeon and enter into an unequal battle with dangerous enemies!

name: The Transference
description: Escape from your own house, in which you have been locked up. But be careful, you will not be alone in your captivity. Immerse yourself in this first-person horror adventure, full of family secrets and betrayals. And find out who and why they locked you up.

name: Draft Day Sports: Pro Basketball 2024
description: Draft Day Sports: Pro Basketball 2024 puts you in the role of general manager of your favorite basketball team. Every decision can be made by you from drafting, trading, signing free agents all the way to making each substitution to lead your team to championship glory and becoming a dynasty.

name: Beneath the Earth: Backrooms
description: Beneath The Earth - Backrooms is a Co-Op horror game that can be played with at least 1 and up to 4 players. Where you and your friends will fight to escape from the different levels of the backrooms, solving different puzzles.

name: Shadow Pulse
description: Nightmares come true when Leonard Venturi sets out on his first mission. Falsely convicted, sentenced to certain death, he follows a reconnaissance team deep into the nightmarish forests and ruins that remain of human civilization.

name: Realms of Riddles: Wizards'Keep
description: Immerse yourself in a captivating first-person escape room in a magical medieval world. Interact with an interactive environment, discover secrets and solve challenging puzzles to unravel a plot full of mysteries - challenge your wits!

name: Swords & Shields AdvBattleBoard
description: A casual puzzle played with 4 sided chits with a swords or a shield on an edge played on a classic chess board. when chits clash they may rotate or capture the other, your objective is to capture the crown chits, there are 4 on both sides.

name: Insurgency: Sandstorm - Ultimate Edition
description: Insurgency: Sandstorm Ultimate Edition includes the base game and passes for Year 1, Year 2, and Year 3. Feel every bullet in thrilling close-quarters combat as your team fights toward victory in intense co-op and PvP multiplayer modes.

name: Workplace Fantasy All Age Edition
description: Workplace Fantasy takes a fictional seaside town as its main stage, telling the story of a newly graduated intern working and living here, as well as communicating, interacting, and delving deeper into the diverse residents of the town.

name: Shell Runner
description: 2045. Life's never been cheaper. Shells mean you can come back if you have money. You used to. Now you're on the bottom in a cyberpunk sprawl. Claw your way back up through wet work as a Shell Runner, in a PvE extraction looter shooter, where a gig can make you rich - or broke.

name: Realm of the Undead
description: A classic, round-based, co-op zombie survival game where you survive endless rounds of zombies with friends or solo.

name: Slimes & Dusters TO
description: Lead an army of slimes on the offensive against the dusters that have invaded your planet and restore your home to its former glory in this Tower Offense game!

name: Color Collar
description: Color Collar is a free to play lighthearted puzzle game for all ages. Play as Aaron the robot dog and fix up the machines of John the scientist in order to open up the mysterious pandora’s lunchbox.

name: Golems and Gnomes
description: Play the first person hero who fights golems, witches, ghosts, and gnomes! Clear all the stages and win the game! Essentially a toned down killing floor with early PS1/N64 aesthetics.

name: The Stalked
description: Escaped from Liam's obsession, Kate seeks refuge in her grandpa's mansion. Strange occurrences raise questions about Liam's presence or another figure. Unraveling mysterious letters, Kate embarks on a journey, seeking peace.

name: Chess Exerciser
description: Become a better chess player with learning by repetition. Exercise from 3.000+ opening lines and discover their best continuation. Learn tactics from millions of puzzles split into 38 categories and 11 difficulty levels. Master 18.000+ endgame positions sorted by category and difficulty.

name: Jolly Good: Tea and Scones
description: Extract yourself from another fine mess–this time, with your family watching! Mischief, mix-ups, and bewilderingly urgent capers at your ancestral estate.

name: Watermelon Game
description: A Casual Physics Puzzle game, where you have to combine matching Fruits to get Points and increase your Highscore. Play solo or measure your skills against another player online.

name: Violet Kingdom
description: A single player RPG adventure

name: Clicker Arena
description: Clicker Arena, the place where heroes are made and wheat is separated from the chaff. It's a new generation of idle games, the laid-back gameplay of clickers with randomness, replayability, and resource management usually found in roguelikes. Can you survive when every decision matters?

name: Cubicatch
description: Cubicatch is a puzzle game where you navigate a mind-bending world as a cube, shifting between 2D and 3D, and use the properties of different blocks to solve intricate puzzles! Discover and master different mechanics in this unique and challenging puzzle game.

name: Dethrone
description: Dethrone is a minimalistic city builder / management game where you govern a medieval town... unfortunately under the rule of a ruthless king. Will you perish from his wrath or be able to turn the tide?

name: Nine Days
description: 9 Days brings a psychological horror experience where you play as a father. One time, someone kidnaps your child, and The kidnapper asks for money if he wants his child safe. In the end, you must find a way to make money as fast as possible and try to survive by hiding from them.

name: Human Phobia
description: Immerse yourself in a world of your own nightmares and fears. In this game, you play as different unique characters whose deepest fears have become a reality. Choose your phobia and experience an intriguing storyline!

name: Cats Hidden in Jingle Jam
description: Find and discover 100 cute cats hidden around a festive holiday village in this FREE hand-drawn hidden object game. Can you find them all?

name: Girl X Island
description: Survive and thrive on a mysterious island in this captivating RPG visual novel game. Gather resources, craft, and make life-altering choices in a stunning world.

name: Sweet Town
description: Sweet Town is a challenging roguelike top-down shooter where players, as a brave child, must save their town from an Evil Spirit's influence on Halloween night by defeating manipulated enemies and collecting candies to summon and defeat the spirit.

name: Hand Me A Lighter
description: Hand Me A Lighter is a story-driven, first-person adventure game about the Dumlupınar submarine which sunk in 1953. Witness the events took place in the submarine before and after the accident from the eyes of a soldier stuck in the submarine.

name: Suzan's Potion Workshop
description: Suzan's Potion Workshop is a fast-paced match 3 game in a fantasy setting.

name: OctaRace
description: OctaRace is an explosive racing game. It pays tribute to the good old multiplayer titles like MicroMachines, offering fun and intense races.

name: The Undersea
description: In 'The Undersea', dive into horror with co-op players hired by AquaMarine Tech to recover HDDs from a secret and abandoned undersea facility. Left untouched for 30 years, the depths hold unknown mysteries and dangers. Explore the secrets, but beware of what lurks in the darkness.

name: Back to the Fooker: Zombie Fooker 2
description: No persons under the age of 18 permitted.Join Doug Fooker, Nunya Bidness, and Kim Aginavi as they try to cure the zombie virus by going back in time to find a pure form of the virus.

name: House of Chavez
description: In this visual novel, play as Adriana and travel to Europe with her brother Bruno and meet Silke, who attended to Adriana's grandmother Maria during her final moments. Explore House Chavez's shadowy hallways. Unveil secrets, delve into their profound connection, and navigate the mysteries within.

name: BlockJump
description: BlockJump is a difficult platformer game with the idea that you replay sections of the game to try and beat it faster with each attempt. There are various ways to beat almost every level and some routes require you to master the mechanics of the game to beat them in quick succession.

name: Project Stocks
description: A darkly humorous and wacky trading simulator. Engage in market manipulation, insider trading, and ruthless deal-making as you battle AI tycoons and human traders. Short, speculate, form alliances, betray, and bend the rules to build your fortune.

name: Memorion
description: Memorion is a puzzle game in which you need to turn on all the orbs. Each orb you turn on changes the state of the adjacent orbs. Will you have the courage and the wits to turn on all the orbs and recover your memories? The answers lie within the depths of your own mind.

name: Pathogen Purge: Tower Defense
description: Pathogen Purge is a thrilling microbiological tower defense game, combining strategy and action as players become Nanobot Guardians defending the human body against relentless germs and viruses.

name: Bulken
description: Bulken is a rogue-like action-RPG where you find yourself on a gigantic derelict spaceship filled with lurking monsters.

name: Gradient Flow
description: Gradient Flow Is A Free-to-Play Minimalist Racing Game.Choose from single-player time attack, split-screen, or online multiplayer modes to challenge your skills.Create and share your own racetracks with the community!

name: Paranox
description: Paranox is a singleplayer horror game. Dive into darkness as a daring paranormal researcher, unraveling the ominous mysteries of a forsaken school. In its haunting corridors, you're not just a spectator—evil lurks in the shadows, stalking your every move. Will you survive the terror?

name: Ghosts of Tabor: Taran Tactical JW3
description: The Merchant of Death has some new stock, from our partners at Taran Tactical! We bring you four new firearms and one melee weapon, as seen in JW3.

name: Insurgency: Sandstorm - Mountain Nomad Gear Set
description: Combine the rugged resilience of nomadic attire and the tactical prowess of combat gear with the Mountain Nomad Gear Set for Insurgents. This set includes five different cosmetic gear pieces.

name: Insurgency: Sandstorm - Woodburn Weapon Skin Set
description: Bring a touch of timeless elegance to your arsenal and embrace the charm of classic wood weapons with the Woodburn Weapon Skin Set for Insurgents. This skin can be applied to six different weapons.

name: Little Big City
description: Be the Mayor! Design and build the prospering city of your dreams! Make it a wonderful place to live for your citizens using a vast number of creative resources. Unleash your imagination as you place functional buildings and cool decorations. Meet characters who can't wait to be your neighbors and help each other's cities grow. You can even take an entertaining break from being Mayor with special mini-games that will challenge you and offer various missions and collectibles.

name: Rain Wonder Trip
description: Rain Wonder Trip is a quizz quizz/adventure game featuring Asias most popular RandB singer Rain. In the game, player goes on a trip with Rain and discovers everything there is to know about him and his life through multiple series of quizz and never seen before videos.

name: BMX Bastards
description: Customize your BMX and dive into a giant open world wich include Bike Parks from all around the world waiting for you.Can't find your favorite spot? Create it by yourself in our park editor.Don't wait any longer and come to prove you're a true Rider!

name: The Texas Chain Saw Massacre: Sonny Outfit Pack
description: Just because you are fighting for your life doesn't mean you can't do it in style! This DLC pack gives you one brand new outfit with several color variants for Sonny.

name: The Texas Chain Saw Massacre: Leland Outfit Pack
description: Just because you are fighting for your life doesn't mean you can't do it in style! This DLC pack gives you one brand new outfit with several color variants for Leland.

name: The Texas Chain Saw Massacre: Julie Outfit Pack
description: Just because you are fighting for your life doesn't mean you can't do it in style! This DLC pack gives you one brand new outfit with several color variants for Julie.

name: The Texas Chain Saw Massacre: Connie Outfit Pack
description: Just because you are fighting for your life doesn't mean you can't do it in style! This DLC pack gives you one brand new outfit with several color variants for Connie.

name: The Texas Chain Saw Massacre: Ana Outfit Pack
description: Just because you are fighting for your life doesn't mean you can't do it in style! This DLC pack gives you one brand new outfit with several color variants for Ana.

name: The Texas Chain Saw Massacre: Slaughter Family Bloody Skins Pack
description: Show off your lust for brutality with these blood-soaked variants of the Family's default outfit. Includes 1 bloody skin for Leatherface, The Cook, The Hitchhiker, Sissy, and Johnny.

name: Midnight Pool 3
description: While you’re in Las Vegas on business, your uncle asks you for a simple favor. Before you know it, your boss’s car is stolen and your world turns upside down. Follow a trail of clues and bizarre personalities through dark pool halls, bustling bars, flashy casinos, and more, all in the hopes of tracking down the missing car and becoming the best pool player in Sin City.

name: Champions of Avan
description:
The fate of Avan is yours to write.

From small acorns great oaks grow. In this idle miner game you start with a small and humble village, tucked away in a shadowy corner of the land of Rokmyer, and are tasked with building it up into a grand and prosperous city deserving of a place of pride on both the map of the land and in the pages of history books.

name: SingStar: Pop Hits 4
description: Sin descripción

name: SingStar: Pop Hits 2
description: Sin descripción

name: The Curious Study of Dr. Blackwood
description: Explore a room full of magic and mystery in our free VR tech demo! Experiment with spectral power, reveal hidden secrets, or just chill . . . in The Curious Study of Dr. Blackwood!

name: Adrenaline Rampage
description: Adrenaline Ramage is a shoot’em up survival game based on dodge and run and platformer mechanics with roguelite elements. Hit and run!

name: Galaxy Force
description: CAUTION: FOUR MEGA POWER! Not double, not triple, but FOUR times the playing power of a regular cartidge. You get the hottest space combat, the baddest explosions, and the coolest sounds ever! Journey to four different planets, each with stunning but deadly landscapes. There's so many awesome enemies, you won't have time to stargaze!

name: U.D.E. No.124 Tokyo Ghost Village
description: A hardcore real-time strategy and first-person shooter from "727 Not Hound" in Japanese, on Steam in 2023.

name: Kibitz Bugs
description:
Play Gomoku with your Twitch viewers!
Login with Twitch and Just chat to vote. The coordinate with the most votes is the chosen move.
Already popular on Twitch. Played by several streamers with 100k+ viewers!

name: Ugly Button Adventure
description: The Ugly Button Adventure is a classic example of point and click and escape room adventure games that are loved by many gamers around the world. Players will have to solve puzzles and interact with different objects in the game to progress and escape from the unknown room. If you are a fan of escape room games, then Ugly Button Adventure will be right up your alley. It has all the elements that make escape rooms so thrilling, such as hidden clues, puzzles, and a sense of urgency to escape.

name: Finding Nemo
description: Finding Nemo is a platformer for the Sega Mega Drive made by Glorysun, and a simple graphical hack of James Pond, originally developed by Vectordean Ltd, Millenium Interactive and Electronic Arts.

name: Six Hours at Hugo's
description:
You are an unemployed college junior who is strapped for cash. While browsing the Yellow Pages, you notice an ad for a night watchman position at Hugo's Hole in the Wall. It looks simple enough, and you could definitely use the money. You decide to give them a call and see when you can start.
Little do you know what awaits...

name: Call of Duty: World at War Map Pack 2
description: Call of Duty: World at War Map Pack 2 continues to expand the addictive COD multiplayer experience with four new maps. Battle to control the river bridge in “Banzai” a bright jungle map featuring a waterfall and hidden caves. In “Corrosion” face down your enemy in a shattered train yard, and in “Sub Pens” wipe the monsoon rain from your eyes as you struggle over a bombed-out submarine base. The Zombies return in “Shi No Numa” (Zombie Swamp) featuring Perk machines, the deadly new Wunderwaffe DG-2, new Achievements and flaming Hell Hounds.

name: Call of Duty: World at War Map Pack 3
description: Call of Duty: World at War Map Pack 3 further expands the COD multiplayer experience with four new maps. Fight for ocean territory in "Battery," defend Russia's resources in "Revolution," and battle in the dense streets of "Breach." Zombies return in "Der Riese" (Zombie Factory), a Nazi research facility featuring a weapon upgrading Pack A Punch Machine, teleporters, and 10 Achievements.

name: Survive la France
description: A browser text-game in which you travel from city to city and try to manage your food, water and sleep in order to survive until you find a suitable city in France or the USA.

name: Spiral Roll
description: Sin descripción

name: Quadris
description: Sin descripción

name: Hyper Rift
description: Hyper Rift is a visual gamebook adventure that draws inspirations from science fiction mysteries. We've crafted an original science fiction story that blends real science with imaginations and present choices that lead to far-reaching consequences. It also features number puzzles, situational puzzles, multiple endings and interesting characters that can save your life or betray you in critical moments.

name: Serum
description: Serum is an interactive text adventure game that takes you on a thrilling sci-fi journey. With its engaging Choose Your Own Adventure-style gameplay, Serum immerses you in a unique sci-fi world where you play as one of the few humans who can pilot a ship between planets. Navigate a dangerous world where aliens are exploiting Earth's resources and make choices that will determine the fate of both worlds.

name: Genshin Impact: Masquerade of the Guilty
description:
Version 4.2 of Genshin Impact, which includes:
• New characters: Furina and Charlotte
• New areas: Erinnyes Forest and Morte Region
• New main story quests: Chapter IV, Act V - "Masquerade of the Guilty"
• New story quest for Furina
• New main event: Thelxie's Fantastic Adventures
• …and more!

name: Ikaro: Will Not Die
description: From Futurlab, the award-winning creators of Powerwash Simulator and Velocity, in partnership with Thunderful, comes IKARO, a momentum-based, fast-flowing action rogue-lite, set in a futuristic, neon facility.

name: Zombie Town
description: Zombie Town is an unreleased game that Markus Persson (Notch) was developing around February of 2009.

name: Super Mario Starlight
description: Super Mario Starlight is a solo project that takes a unique spin on a traditional hack. The game has a hub world that lets you explore and find levels freely, but the stages themselves are linear, like a traditional Mario game. Think Peach's Castle from 64 with about 20ish linear stages instead of open world stages. Yoshi Coins act as the main collectable. The more you collect, the more levels and areas of the hub world you will be able to access.

name: Spirit of the North 2
description:
Unveil the mysteries of a beautiful ancient world in this breathtaking 3rd-Person Adventure, a sequel to the acclaimed ‘Spirit of the North.’ Take on the role of an isolated fox with a raven companion on a quest to restore the lost guardians and return home.

In an ancient world left in ruin, embark on the journey of an isolated fox far from home. With the help of a wise Raven companion, seek out the lost legendary guardians and release them from the grasp of the dark shaman Grimnir.

name: The Restricted Archive
description:
A point & click adventure created for Adventure Jam 2023.

A voice in your sleep orders you to steal the fabled Necronomicon from the library of the world-renownd Miskatonic University. Will giving in and doing it finally put an end to your nightmares?

name: Stranger in Utopia
description:
Teleia: a self-sufficient island separated from the outside world that has seen no poverty, unemployment, or crime in 60 years.

Until now.

When a brutal murder is committed, you, Lieutenant Stevenson, are called from the mainland to investigate. Discover the secrets of the island, find the killer, and their motives! Not everything is as it seems...

name: Why the Wrong Face?
description: A game jam point and click adventure game about disguises and treasure.

name: Tunnel Vision
description:
Trapped on a sabotaged train speeding toward a tunnel with a bomb, an heiress struggles to stop the train in time. Save the passengers and escape the train car before it's too late. The clock is ticking!

A 2D first-person point-and-click adventure game with nostalgic low-res CGA 4-color graphics.

name: Aaarghpocalypse
description: Aaarghpocaylpse is a game that lets you survive the stream or survive solo. Name your group of survivors, or let Twitch viewers step into their shoes, and see who lives or dies!

name: A Day with the Wiggles
description: Sin descripción

name: Rocko's Modern Life: Match-Master
description: Generic memory game featuring images from the Nickelodeon cartoon.

name: As Aventuras da Abelhinha Maya
description: Sin descripción

name: Rugrats: Match-Master
description: Generic memory game featuring characters from the cartoon

name: The Journey of Allen Strange: Match-Master
description: Generic memory game based on the sci-fi sitcom

name: Winnie the Pooh: First Steps
description: Sin descripción

name: Ren & Stimpy: Match-Master
description: A generic memory game based on the cartoon

name: The Angry Beavers: Match-Master
description: A generic memory game based on the cartoon

name: Hey Arnold!: Match-Master
description: Generic memory game based on the cartoon

name: Match Hit: Puzzle Fighter
description: Street fighting with street food!

name: Isekai Frontline
description: You are the only 'guy' in this zombie apocalypse world! Fight with endless zombie hordes and have a good time with cute girls!

name: Rui wa Tomo o Yobu
description: kutsu Tomo was brought up by his mother as a girl due to a small mark he has on his body. After his mother's death, he discovers via her will that she emphasizes Tomo continue to live as a female, and following this, Tomo starts to go through more troubles in his life. Tomo soon discovers that he is linked with five girls who are around his age as a second year high school student. These girls happen to have the same mark he has, and also have been going through hardships in their lives. Tomo and these five girls decide to form a pact to stay together and support each other to solve each of their problems and to bring peace to their lives.

name: Fruit Salad
description: Fruit Salad is a cozy physics-based match 2 game where you drop and merge fruits together to try and beat the high score before you reach the top!

name: Super Mario Place
description: The princess has been kidnapped! Even worse, it's a Tuesday! Mario hates Tuesdays. Run. Jump. FLY through 11 worlds of platforming mayhem to save the day!

name: Franchise Hockey Manager 10
description: Franchise Hockey Manager 10 is the latest (2023) version of the Franchise Hockey Manager series. Releasing in November of 2023, FHM10 continues to build off of its previous versions and has added a variety of new features. Franchise Hockey Manager is the only NHL Licensed game on PC.

name: Inamina
description:
Jacob Miller's life is a mess, with no future. Everything will change after receiving the invitation to participate in the last stage of a new food product.

During the ten days that the trial will last, the participants will undergo a strange program of physical and sensory stimulation based on a new way of understanding food production and human nutrition.
The trial will be carried out in full isolation at the Spira food and nutrition facility.
Be part of something that will change the future of humanity, be part of Spira.

name: Tootsie Pop
description: Tootsie Pop is a multi-platform match 2 mobile game based on the American Nostalgia brand Tootsie Pop.

name: Transformers: Beast Wars Transmetals
description: Now, experience a Transformers battle you've never seen before! Take command of the Heroic Maximals and Evil Predicons as they struggle for supremacy! More powerful than ever, these cybertronian warriors can convert into 3 modes: beast, vehicle, and robot. Run, blast and transform your way to victory! Crush the competition with the awesome Ultra Blast attack!

name: Sunset Humanity
description:
Help a rogue A.I bring about the end of humanity.
Just another routine test, or at least that was the plan...

name: Dear Esther
description: Dear Esther is an award-winning, critically acclaimed, experimental first-person game. Built in the Source engine, it abandons traditional gameplay, leaving only a rich world soaked in atmosphere, and an abstract, poetic story to explore. Dear Esther was originally launched in 2008 and was later rebuilt by Robert Briscoe in 2012 and 2016.

name: Sesame's Haunting
description: Sesame's peaceful life of solitude takes an unexpected turn after she unleashes a poltergeist, courtesy of her mischievous neighbor and longtime nemesis, Rutabaga. Brew potions, grow plants, and problem-solve Sesame's ghostly dilemma in this cute and spooky minigame!

name: 100+ Great Games
description: 100+ Great Games is a collection of just over one hundred shareware and freeware casual games.

name: 100+ Great Games: Volume II
description: 100+ Great Games: Volume II is a collection of just over one hundred casual games. The games are grouped into four categories, Action, Board, Puzzle and Cards.

name: 203 Game Pack
description: 203 Game Pack is a game compilation that is bundled in 505 Game Collection and 303 Game Collection.

name: Sicko Sanctum 2
description: Enemies are weapons. Style is power. Your only goal, total violence. SICKO SANCTUM 2 is an innovative score-attack movement-shooter crafted from the design lessons of modern classics such as ULTRAKILL and HYPER DEMON. Featuring a simple player move-set in combination with synergistic enemy design, SICKO SANCTUM 2 represents the cutting-edge of digitized violence.

name: Millennium GamePak Gold
description: Millennium GamePak Gold is a compilation game disc for Windows.

name: Millennium Gamepak Platinum
description: Millennium Gamepak Platinum is a collection of casual games for Windows.

name: Ultimate Gamepak
description: Ultimate Gamepak is a PC collection of over one hundred casual games.

name: Vec-Man
description: Minimalistic Pac-Man clone in the style of the original eighties' Vectrex games

name: Castle Defender
description: Missile Command and Defender clone

name: Climb It
description: Climb It is a Side-Scroller where you face difficult obstacles to get to the finish line.

name: Don't Break My Heart
description:
Eradicate as many of Cupid's arrows as possible, so that less people in this world will fall victim
to the endless cycle of sadness and sorrow.

name: Frog Jump
description: Doodle Jump clone

name: Tank Attack
description:
You are a recruit tank driver, responsible for your own tank.
Your mission is to protect the jungle from enemy tanks, controlled by AI (single-player mode) or by your friend (multi-player mode).

name: Get The Beer
description: Jump & Run game

name: Vectrexit
description: Maze game where the player has to get to the exit within a given time without touching borders while the maze changes its shape. Gadgets can help you achieve this goal.

name: Grain Sling
description: Feed your chickens in a Shooting Gallery style game

name: Evasive
description: Jump and Run game for real grinder

name: 303 Game Collection
description: 303 Game Collection is a game bundle featuring 2 previous game compilations by ValuSoft.

name: Hand of the Goddess
description: This was made for IGMC Rebirth and can be finished within an hour, as per contest rules. The game definitely isn't perfect (especially since I stick to the default animations instead of using my own), but I'm happy with it. I've only been able to work on this game because I was stuck indoors for weeks because I caught Covid. I've spent most of my Covid time working on this and I'm kinda exhausted of it. Anyway, Covid is still here and serious, take care of yourselves y'all.

name: ChampionsTCG
description: Play Champions of Otherwordly Magic, a fast-paced and simple turn-based trading card game feature cute and adorable Champions that you can own, buy, sell and trade with other gamers!

name: Fishing Minigame 2
description: The pseudo-visual novel sequel to the first Fishing Minigame is here! The hero Roselle decides to re-visit the Fishing Shrine to have a good time and finds herself enraptured by the minigame, to the dismay of the shrine's sage and another visitor. Dark Lord? Who cares about that fella?

name: Iaidoka_Interlude
description: A pseudo 8-bit action platformer taking a bit of inspiration from film-noir and samurai dramas, iaidoka_interlude applies a few parkour and fighting game influences to mix up familiarity with a little uniquity.

name: Hikibyou2
description: Hikibyou2 is an action/adventure platfomer with puzzle and stealth elements. A bit of what differentiates itself from the first title in the series, Hikikomori No Chuunibyou, is this successor's less realistic approach and more atmospheric vibe. Levels are once again open-ended with the story directing the player.

name: Complex Complex
description: A short, absurd game of crude humor, Complex Complex is a two-dimensional sex simulator that has you moving into the apartment occupied by your abnormal step-sister and her equally-as-odd cousin. It’s a living situation where the heat can only turn up!

name: Fire Emblem: The Lonely Mirror
description: Sin descripción

name: 5 in 1: Scrap Bolts + Toroom + Last Mage Survivor + Home Sweet Home + Bruxa
description: Sin descripción

name: Lyssa: Goddess of Rage
description: Various battlefields with random obstacles and different heroes with unique bonuses to hone your strategy skills. Explore the map, defeat powerful bosses, build your story line, accept quests and embark on a journey! Assemble your forces and lead your party to Victory!

name: Train Sim World 3: Peak Forest Railway - Ambergate - Chinley & Buxton
description: Step back in time and discover a long-lost railway. Re-tread the rails through historical English countryside in the hard-working Fowler 4F. The quaint and waning years of 1960s steam is brought back to life in Train Sim World 3: Peak Forest Railway!

name: Sweet Dreams Alex: Full Moon Edition
description: Fall peacefully into the dreamscape with Sweet Dreams Alex: Full Moon Edition, which combines the game and its soundtrack into a single wholesome bundle.

name: Trash Troopers: Earth Reclaim
description: On a distopic future full of polution and contamination you will lead your Troopers to collect garbage, dismantle old oil facilities, build houses, crops and transform waste into incredible things like solar panels, water tanks, and recycling stations. Build your own greener town

name: Insurgency: Sandstorm - Onslaught Set Bundle
description: Get ready for an explosive new update in Insurgency: Sandstorm! Bring unmatched destruction to the battlefield and dominate your enemies with the Onslaught Set Bundle of premium gear items and weapon skins.

name: Insurgency: Sandstorm - Mountain Tactical Gear Set
description: Embark on a thrilling battle with the Mountain Tactical Gear Set for Security! Gear up and conquer any rugged terrain that stands in your way. This set includes five different cosmetic gear pieces.

name: Insurgency: Sandstorm - Year 3 Pass
description: Kit yourself out, soldier! The Year 3 Pass for Insurgency: Sandstorm will give you one year of cosmetic sets from the four upcoming Operations!

name: Insurgency: Sandstorm - Digital Splatter Skin Set
description: Take the perfect cover with the Digital Splatter Weapon Skin Set for Security and paint the battlegrounds with your personal touch. This skin can be applied to six different weapons.

name: Insurgency: Sandstorm - Year 1+2+3 Bundle
description: The Year 1+2+3 Bundle gives you instant access to 32 cosmetic sets from the Year 1 and Year 2 Passes, and 4 additional reward items from the Year 2 Pass. Also includes the 16 already released or upcoming cosmetic sets from the Year 3 Pass. Customize your Security and Insurgent soldiers from head to toe with brand new gear and weapon skins.

name: Winkeltje: Cat Companion
description: Sin descripción

name: 8Floor Bundle 3 in 1
description:
This pack includes:
Gnomes Garden 8: Return of the Queen
Roads of Time
Roads of Time 2: Odyssey

name: NASCAR Heat Bundle
description: NASCAR Heat bundle, containing Heat 5 Ultimate , Heat 4 Gold Edition, Heat 3 Ultimate and the NASCAR Heat 5: Next Gen Car Update (2002)

name: Cities: Skylines II - Ultimate Edition
description: Raise a city from the ground up and transform it into a thriving metropolis with the most realistic city builder ever. Push your creativity and problem-solving to build on a scale you've never experienced. With deep simulation and a living economy, this is world-building without limits.

name: Anime Uni
description: A puzzle game that can be played with one hand.

name: My Sexy Anthro: Fluttertime!
description: My Sexy Anthro: Fluttertime! is a pornographic My Little Pony visual novel developed by Fatelogic on Newgrounds in 2013. The game prominently features the Equestria Girls variation of Fluttershy.

name: Toilet Fight: Open World
description: You begin your journey as a simple cameraman, determined to survive and expose the terrible threat that Skibidi Toilets pose.

name: House of 1000 Doors: Evil Inside - Collector's Edition
description:
Use the power of light to defeat a devastating darkness before it destroys mankind!
Locate cleverly hidden objects, solve cunning puzzles, and complete challenging mini-games as you cleanse everything the infection has touched!

Guide Emily as she explores three amazing worlds ruled by the members of the House, whom the darkness has possessed.
As you locate cleverly hidden objects, solve cunning puzzles, and complete challenging mini-games, you'll use the light within Emily to cleanse everything the infection has touched.
With stunning artwork and animation, cinematic quality cutscenes, and an original soundtrack that will immerse you in the thrills of a breathtaking adventure House of 1000 Doors: Evil Inside is an experience you'll never forget!

name: Ice Scream 6 Friends: Charlie
description:
Charlie explores the kitchen to join his friends.
In the previous chapter J. collaborated with Mike to help him escape from the engine room and meet in the control room. However, there are still 2 friends to rescue, and it seems they have already found the next one, this time inside the factory’s kitchen.
In this new installment you will play as Charlie, who is still lost in the factory and who, with J.'s help, will have to face all the dangers that await him inside the factory. Switch players and go back to being J. whenever you need to. Explore the new parts of the factory in this chapter, meet the new Super Robot in charge of the kitchen, and take on the Mini-Rods and the ice-cream man to get the friends back together.

name: Tatara Kogasa's Surprise Operation
description: Tatara Kogasa's Surprise Operation on Halloween! It's a grand operation to surprise everyone with cute Tatara Kogasa!? Let's surprise Gensokyo's humans and youkais from behind and collect a lot of candy!

name: Hide and Seek: Toilet Monster
description: Hurry up! The Skibidi Toilet Monster is attacking the Cameraman!

name: Jumpy 1D: Christmas Edition
description: Jumpy 1D: Christmas Edition is a Chritsmas themed fan game based on the band One Direction. The game is a score based game where you avoid obstacles to achieve a max score.

name: One Night At Freddy's
description: Try the real horror of the game One Night At Freddy's

name: Follow the Rules
description: Follow the Rules is an immersive 1-4 player co-op horror experience. As a night shift guard, your mission is to protect haunted locations. The key to survival lies in strictly following a set of vital rules. Will you make it through the night?

name: Pawar
description: Rougelike, Rougelike, or Rougelike, please, have some different rougelike. Tower defense, rougelike, fusion, enhancement, upgrade, and quality improvement, providing a different gaming experience. Come and give it a try~

name: Rolling for Romance
description: Rolling for Romance is a Slice-of-Life dating sim where you find companionship through the magical world of Dungeons and Dragons! Go through your first year of college as you make friends, bond with your fellow club members, and potentially roll your way into one of their hearts!

name: Five Nights at Freddy's AR Lite
description: Five Nights at Freddy's AR Lite is a recreation of Five Nights at Freddy's AR Special Delivery, without any augmented reality.

name: Lone Wolf Saga
description: Lone Wolf Saga is a digital implementation of the Lone Wolf gamebook series created by Joe Dever. The digital implementation includes automated random number generation for the combat system, automatic health tracking, as well as inventory tracking and management.

name: Arcade Archives: Burning Force
description:
Pass the graduation exam
to become a glorious space fighter!

name: Island of Mine
description: Acquire new islands and step into the unknown! Who knows what awaits you on the next island?

name: Crazy People
description: This is a cartoon shooting.

name: Brawlberry
description: Battle the fruit guardians as you hack and slash through the fruit scape in this coop rogue-like dungeon crawler.

name: Dark and Deep
description: A conspiracy podcast drags you into a world of mystery and terror. Reveal secrets and horrors with mystical frames given to you by a strange observer. Dark and Deep is a first-person cosmic horror game with a focus on puzzles and exploration.

name: Real Communism
description: Build your own communist utopia! Take control of the means of production to keep your citizens fed, housed, and happy. Grow your city along with its population, and show the world what REAL communism is!

name: Eternal Sacrifice
description: Defend against invaders with unique gameplay blending real-time combat & tower defense. Master soul-shifting & explore a rich universe with diverse characters for an immersive ARPG experience.

name: Terraforming Mars: Venus Next
description: Expand your terraformation to Venus. Hasten your game with the new Solar Phase and multiply your opportunities with 49 new project cards, 5 new corporation and a new additional board. The Morning Star awaits!

name: A Touch of Magic
description: A Touch of Magic is a choice-driven adult Visual Novel set in the fictional city of Solestra Hills, a safe heaven for magical beings but full of mafias, drugs and depravity. Play as Giovanni Beneventi and go on a journey filled with drama, comedy, a dark conspiracy and lots of sex.

name: Stop the Slimes
description: Stop the Slimes is a tower defense card-based game where you need to protect their realm from a relentless invasion of the slimes. In this strategic and turn-based adventure, players assemble a formidable deck of cards of towers and spells.

name: Hey, Man!: Born in the Electric
description: 2D Platform Puzzle Game in which Steve, whose body has been switched to electricity, has to fight the evil herd 'Rino Porco'.

name: Entities
description: We combined fast-paced roguelike combat with a randomized procedural format to make the best third-person single player we could. Entidades is a survival game, which tells the story of a very mischievous boy, who lived in colonial Brazil, suffered from religious abuse and slavery at the time.

name: 101-in-1 Games Anthology
description: Handpicked from all 101-in-1 Games series, this release offers only the most popular games. Puzzle games, fast paced arcade action, racing, sports, cooking, shooting, sudoku and many many more!

name: Find the Pairs Memo Game for Kids
description: No friend nearby to play with? Then just play Find the pairs of picture cards against an intelligent, funny cat!

name: Victoria 3: Colossus of the South
description: Rich in culture and resources, South America enters the Victorian Age. Many challenges await nations newly freed from European dominance. Stake your claim on the future of the Southern Hemisphere in Colossus of the South, a new Region Pack for Victoria 3.

name: Lucky One
description: "Lucky One" is a visual novel for adults only. A young slob named Fred enrolls in the Department of Linguistics, where he struggles to find a girlfriend, being the only guy on the stream.

name: Mambo a Go Go
description: Sin descripción

name: Slayaway Camp 2
description:
Remember Skullface, the extremely malicious masked killer from Blue Wizard’s 2016 cult hit Slayaway Camp? Well, some random campers made the mistake of summoning him from beyond the grave, and now he’s trapped inside a very familiar-looking streaming service. That means hundreds of potential new victims splattered across classic movie genres. And they’re not going to decapitate themselves, are they?

Step into Skullface’s blood-soaked boots or choose from a murderous lineup of horror heavyweights like Gourd Head, the Killer Fridge, and Demon Doll. This gruesomely funny tribute to ‘80s horror invites you to perfect the art of the scare. Maneuver through sliding block logic puzzles, find hiding spots, collect secret bonus machetes and unleash grisly finishers to elevate your kills and escalate your score.

Rack up star ratings to unlock an expanding horror universe packed with new genres, settings, slayers and stunts as you guide Skullface on his murderous media mission!

name: Block'D
description: Block'D takes block-clearing puzzle fun to new levels. This compelling and exciting casual game is easy to pick-up-and-play but hard to put down! Clear same-coloured blocks to score points and win big. Wildcards, bombs, and lightning blocks keep the grid unpredictable and increase your chances to clear blocks quickly. Enjoy progressively challenging levels and two distinct play modes - clear the entire grid in Marathon, blasting blocks at your own pace, or race the clock in Speed mode.

name: Happy World
description:
Welcome to Happy World! Restore happiness to us and I will reward you!

3 Worlds are infested with negative energy. Please consider restoring positive energy back to them!

name: Red's Revenge
description: Red's Revenge is a chilling power-washing game. Explore a haunted hospital and discover it's secrets and what happened to Little Red.

name: Party Project
description:
Party Project compiles boards, items, and mechanics from Mario Party, and minigames from multiple sources to create an ultimate-esque game.

With options like Item Toggles, Minigame Toggles, and Bonus Star Multipliers, among many others, you can customize matches however you'd like!

name: LEGO World Soccer
description: LEGO World Soccer is a soccer game for everyone. Gamers can play as pirates, construction workers and other characters in unique LEGO-themed settings.

name: Mooshie's Kitchen 2
description: Welcome back to Mooshie's Kitchen! Things have changed since you were last here...

name: Mooshie's Kitchen 3
description: Mooshie has returned once more in the finale of the Mooshie's Kitchen trilogy. This time, he's the President of the United States!

name: Sonic Maze Craze
description: Sonic Maze Craze is a browser game released in 2007 to promote Sonic and the Secret Rings. The game was featured on the Sonic and the Secret Rings official websites before they were later shut down.

name: Sonic the Hedgehog
description: A browser game released in 2004 to promote Sega Superstars. The game was featured on the official websites for Sega Superstars before they were shut down

name: Sonic Heroes Puzzle
description: Sonic Heroes Puzzle is a browser game released in 2004 to promote Sonic Heroes. The game appeared on the Sonic Heroes game websites before they were later shut down.

name: Barbie: Fairytopia
description: 3 Barbie games in 1. Collect stolen Rainbow Gems to save the Crystal Palace.

name: The Lost Fear
description: "The Lost Fear" is a short 10-15 min psychological horror game about a nightmare. Solve puzzles and confront your fears to escape and wake up.

name: Brasil Fusion
description: Brasil Fusion is a free-to-play game with different game modes. Championships, disputes with friends, or the famous Battle Royale will show who are the best favela players in the world.

name: Music Drive
description: Music Drive puts players in the shoes of Tina and Tunner in an adventure that combines car chases and intense shoot-outs.

name: Saborus
description: Saborus is a horror game that puts players in the shoes of Gisele, a chicken escaping from a deadly slaughterhouse. Immerse yourself in a terrifying world with incredible graphics and a chilling atmosphere, where tension and fear await at every turn.

name: Alan Wake II: Night Springs
description: The dark and haunting world of Alan Wake II broadens further with the release of its first major expansion Night Springs. Dive deep into the surreal territory of the fictional TV show 'Night Springs' and embark on quests that are as bizarre as they are thrilling.

name: Alan Wake II: The Lake House
description: Dive into a harrowing survival horror experience with the latest expansion for Alan Wake 2, set in an eerie new location on the shores of Cauldron Lake. Within the Federal Bureau of Control's research station, the Lake House, a catastrophic event has occurred, where reckless experiments have caused reality to collide with the Dark Place.

name: Coloring Game: Studio
description: Coloring Game: Studio is now not only paint by numbers, but also a small graphics editor.

name: Paralysi
description: With a remarkable art style, Paralysi offers a horror-filled adventure with exploration, scares and puzzles to solve.

name: Mega 99Vidas
description: Mega 99Vidas is a port of the beat 'em up for the Sega Genesis/Mega Drive.

name: Adventure Field
description: The original Adventure Field from 2008 with small grammar corrections and new scripts!

name: Adventure Field 2
description: The Adventure Field 2 from 2012 with small grammar corrections and new scripts!

name: Adventure Field 3: Definitive Edition
description: You are a young student living in Sarook. The perfect young student, but you feel something is not right. In dream you see a sword with a powerful aura. This sword is sent to the future from the past and you get teleported. You have to fight your way home with no real promises of success...

name: Teenyshire
description: Draw a TeenyShire and maximise your score in 11 turns by following the likes of all the different elements.

name: Hao x Sora: The Sky's Abound
description: Ride beyond imagination in Hao x Sora: The Sky's Abound, the first action title in the Project Natura series. Rise as a hero out of their time and into the future of Natura, chasing down a old villain with unimaginable speed. Change the board - Equip a garage of hoverboards to store between runs and apply to different situations. Chase the world - Risk it all and choose when to end your run - either preserving your boards or bailing for a hell of a finish.

name: The Twilight Zone II: Final Dreams
description: The Twilight Zone II - Final Dreams (originally released in 1999, and revised in 2014) is the sequel to The Twilight Zone and is a complete 32 level megawad created by Paul Corfiatis. In The Twilight Zone II, you must travel throughout the galaxy via Ethereal Travel to find and defeat Johnny Boy; an evil cartoon character of a boy who's sprite was drawn by Andrew Snow, a penpal Corfiatis knew throughout the late 1990's.

name: The Deep
description: The Deep is a single map for GZDoom 4.5.0 and above. Made for Realms Deep Map Jam 2021, this map features the rainbow shader from Void & Rainbow nestled amongst a black and white landscape.

name: Almistice
description: Almistice (obvious pun intended) is a ten map vanilla episode that tries to celebrate the influence of one of the greatest mappers of the 00s. The wad was started during a period of uncertainty before the Rusty Drill project was created. As such I vowed to finish this off to 10 maps (2 sets of 5 maps each culminating in a death exit on the final map of the set, the first five are space base and the second five take a darker/gothic theme, think a weird cult group with access to tech theme, crudely like Europa3.wad)

name: All the Wiser
description: A collection of birthday maps Major Arlene made last year for various members of the Doom community who are considered to be great influences and friends.

name: Conquered Complex
description: Small, but punchy map and could be rough in some places. Takes about 10 mins to complete.

name: Subverter
description: A very normal map. Definitely nothing untoward going on. ﻿A first playthrough should take 7–10 minutes; it's not possible to get lost.

name: Love Delivery2
description:
The protagonist lives an uneventful and surplus life.

While shopping for second-hand goods to organize his house, he meets , who has just started broadcasting on the Internet. Strangely, he keeps running into her...

Meanwhile, at the internet broadcasting event, she meets , an extremely recognizable streamer from a large company...!

The love they've never been able to express before, the love of their special someone, is streaming!

name: Warrior
description: This is a megawad (32 levels) with common story for all its levels. You are the warrior who fights and passes all levels step by step, combat after combat. Every next level starts where you've finished the previous.

name: Blood in Baldur's Gate
description:
Blood in Baldur's Gate is a community-driven free-to-play narrative browser game developed and published by Larian Studios. It served as a narrative teaser for Baldur's Gate III.

Set 15 years before the events of Baldur's Gate III, players are tasked with investigating a murder in the streets of Baldur's Gate. From June 19 to July 6 in 2023, the community could vote on which locations would be unlocked next. While the polls have ended, players are still able to follow in the voters' original footsteps.

name: Parallels
description: Parallels is a single limit-removing map for Doom II. Inspiration would be mouldy's megawad Going Down, if that gives you a broad idea, and also THT: Threnody for one specific reason.

name: Zeramida
description: Short map in a desert reminiscent to EPIC/Epic 2 wads thematically and difficulty wise. Based on a dream I had several months ago about being trapped in a brown bricked dungeon or something with imps and sergeants ahead in an awkward tight space, while outside the view of two twin forts and nothing but sand and stars around, oh and a big wall in the middle. The ending result is a lot more substantial but the dream parts were recreated almost to perfection, aside from detailing.

name: GoopW
description: GoopW is a set-compilation of 3 very short, intense fast-paced maps for Doom II for limit removing source ports, plus 1 progression stopper, each with a different visual theme.

name: Friday Night Funkin': VS Protegent
description: Friday Night Funkin': VS Protegent is a Friday Night Funkin' mod based around the anti-virus software Protegent.

name: Deep Mine
description: Explore with up to 4 players in a randomly generated world ! Mine, fight, craft and build in this 2D survival game ! You are free to do whatever you want, as long as you do not awaken the demon of the mountains...

name: FolcDark: Part II
description: Folcdark: Part II is the sequel to FolcDark: Part I, a third-person action-adventure dark fantasy game, with a story and characters focused on Brazilian folklore.

name: House Designer 2
description: House Designer 2 is the perfect choice for those who want to test their design skills and create their dream home. With great graphics and ray tracing, tons of mechanics and challenges, and the ability to work on different styles of houses, the game is sure to keep you busy for hours.

name: Delicious Burger
description: Satisfy your customers by accurately delivering a variety of burger orders at Delicious Burger. With the income you earn, decorate your shop as you wish or unlock new burger ingredients.

name: Gemstone Puzzle Fury
description: Gemstone Puzzle Fury - Master Gem Artistry! Conquer 50 challenging levels with radiant gems. Precision and strategy fuse in explosive fun. Embark on the adventure in Monstertopia!

name: Cross Dungeon
description: Connect the tiles and conquer the dungeon. Monsters and treasure await! Defeat monsters and move on. Power up when you get the treasure. Let's proceed while collecting treasures.

name: Dwarf Looter
description: Delve into procedural underground, wielding quirky weapons and bizarre hats. Conquer rats, goblins, and demon lords, all while amassing treasures - but your limited inventory space WILL leads to tough choices. Beware your growing greed in this humor-infused fantasy roguelike challenge.

name: Anaon
description: Anaon is a graphic novel that will immerse you in a supernatural, romantic and horrific plot. Will you manage to cross the twists and turns of History and escape your dreamlike prison?

name: Return to Basic Killing
description: Kill, kill, kill! Then, kill more in this classics-inspired FPS. Return to the basics of the 90s while you find your way out of a tower along 50 intense, action-packed levels. And, hey, in case you care, there is also a background story to all this bloody craziness!

name: Dungeonpreneur
description: Run a bustling tavern and a thriving item shop in a fantasy world built around dungeons and the bountiful resources they have to offer! Go on adventures, befriend lovable locals, build a successful business, and perhaps even become the greatest Dungeonpreneur that ever lived!

name: Nekowater
description: You are a cat. You live in a place where small houses line the area as sea levels rise. You wake up and sleep when you like, and eat what you like.You spend your days like that."Nekowater" is an adventure game where you explore the map, interact with characters, and progress through the game.

name: Aster Initiative
description: A puzzle-horror experience - navigate a huge mid-90s internet and use a variety of programs on your work computer to take down your pharmaceutical company without getting caught.

name: Survivors of Mayhem
description: Survivors of Mayhem - a fast paced fantasy survivor game. Embark on a heart-pounding journey through waves of fantasy battle, where chaos reigns, and your every decision could mean the difference between life and death.
