You'll face relentless waves of enemies, upgrade your character, pick and choose from over two dozen of abilities, a hundred items, and stat upgrades to try to survive.

name: Nightmare Labyrinth
description: Nightmare Labyrinth is an asymmetric VR game where a VR player must navigate a dark maze while avoiding a terrifying creature controlled by a desktop player. Scare your friends in this unique VR/First person experience!

name: Spacecraft Tactics
description: Spacecraft Tactics is a 2D turn-based tactical space game. Save the last rebel outpost in the campaign. Develop a strategy, execute it in tactical battles and micromanage your ship. Play various game modes single or multiplayer. Create your own ships, scenes or mods and share them.

name: Echo of Extinction
description: In the desolate remnants of a world once thriving, you must scavenge and explore the open landscapes of Echo of Extinction. Uncover precious resources scattered throughout, harnessing their power to forge formidable gear and destroy the corrupted Robot Lords.

name: Lorenzo the Runner
description: 2D Mario-like platformer that takes you on an exhilarating adventure through a vibrant cityscape.

name: Tale of Honor
description: Tale of Honor is a real-time, roguelike, deckbuilding chess adventure. Unlock new pieces, abilities and powerups through your unique runs & use them along with your wits to sneak through the evil armies, traps and bosses to capture the Evil King & restore honor back to the world.

name: Cultivation Fantasy
description: Why would a cultivator have to repay debts?

name: Idle Tick
description: An idle game with unique gameplay. No boring idleness and infinite clicking. Complex prestige system and various upgrades. Different currencies and deep management. Infinite possibilities and fun!

name: First Crusader
description: Determine the fate of the Crusaders in this history-based visual novel game. Be the leader of the Christians or the leader of the Turks. Choose your own path in a story where every decision matters. You will change the history of this Crusade.

name: Galaxy Bricks
description: Two classic games collide to create one amazing experience you can always just pick up and play. Enjoy Endless levels and see how high of a score you can get.

name: World Leaders
description: Lead your nation to victory in this multiplayer turn-based war strategy game!

name: Tridasha
description: Two brothers, Charan and Devrat, use combat skills and magic to discover ancient stories on Tridasha Island, seeking a rare radioactive element and overcoming challenges to unlock the power of divine stones.

name: Peggy's Farm
description: Combine the cozy crafting of a farming sim with the satisfying physics of a pachinko game, and what do you get? Peggy's Farm!

name: Space Hopper
description: Navigate varying planets in this gravity twisting space adventure.

name: Sally.Exe
description:
Ready for Round 2?
Sally.Exe - The Game is finally here! Following the success of it's spiritual predecessor, the fanmade follow-up to the legendary Sonic.Exe creepypasta is now brought to life.
There's no stopping...'him'. 'It'. That...'thing'. Call it what you may, it won't matter.
Evil is coming. It's little game is far from over.
And you're next.

name: GameCenter CX: Arino no Chousenjou 1 + 2 Replay
description: Retro Game Challenge 1 + 2 Replay includes remastered versions of the DS games GameCenter CX: Arino no Chousenjou (released as Retro Game Challenge in the west) and sequel GameCenter CX: Arino no Chousenjou 2 (only released in Japan) in celebration of the GameCenter CX TV program’s 20th anniversary. Each game consists of a variety of retro-style minigames.

name: HeadLight
description: A stealth horror survival game.

name: Island Rush
description: Welcome to Island Rush: Surfing Odyssey! Dive into an adventure where sun-kissed waves meet the thrill of the unknown. Choose your avatar, surf to a distant island, and overcome perilous obstacles. Every moment counts - swift action is your key to avoiding destruction.

name: Hidden World 6 Top-Down 3D
description: Find the objects that are hidden on the map.

name: Metal Gear Solid Master Collection: Volume 1 - Day One Edition
description: Sin descripción

name: Soulbound
description: Embark on a journey through time and challenge in Soulbound, an MMORPG Extraction Roguelike that melds a captivating pixel art world with a narrative that bends the very concept of time. Here, extraction isn’t just a mechanic; it's the heart of your adventure.

name: The Miracle Piano Teaching System
description: The Miracle Piano Teaching System is educational software which uses a MIDI keyboard to teach how to play the piano.

name: Bio-Morph Encyclopedia
description: Though he was accused of being a murderer, the English 19th century photographer Edward Muybridge kept taking still photographs of man and animals in motion. The interactive CD-ROM “Bio-Morph Encyclopedia” by Nobuhiro Shibayama is based on plates of his photographs, but shows them from a different perspective.

name: Floyd's Sticker Squad
description:
Shoot enemies, collect stickers and complete the album unlocking amazing adventures in this casual time travelling shoot em up!

Featuring an awesome Time Travelling mechanic, where you get to replay each level with your past-self, making yourself stronger every time! A great game for shoot'em up enthusiasts with epic boss fights!

name: Elemental Force
description: Role-playing game developed by Class Corporation for Macintosh computers.

description: Sin descripción

name: Five Nights at Sonic's 2
description: Welcome to the new and improved Sonic's Hero Pizza Palace! Here you will find 4 of the most recognizable heroes of the 1990's except that they are animatronics. The clones were a little spoiled, so we left it. Do not worry. Even if you work at night, nothing should go wrong.

name: Ufouria: The Saga 2
description:
The remake/sequel to the 1991 SUNSOFT action game Ufouria: The Saga is here!
In this exploration-based side-scrolling action game, the levels' terrain changes every time you enter the area, with even more secrets to find.
The unique and wacky world of Ufouria has been lovingly and faithfully recreated, this time with a handmade feltwork twist.
Join the now fluffy Hebe, O-Chan, Sukezaemon, and Jennifer to protect the earth from the Utsujin invasion!

name: Ctrl+Alt+Repeat
description: Ctrl+Alt+Repeat is a multiplayer 3D parkour platformer where you race against the clock and your friends. The game features 64 hand crafted levels across 4 worlds requiring patience and focus to complete.
